title: Atonement
overview: Single father Lung (Ronald CHENG) and his daughter Ying (FU Shun Ying) are each other’s only dependence. Despite the huge debt left by his ex-wife, Lung believes in good karma for good people, until he loses his beloved daughter in a kidnap while travelling in Thailand.  Lung abandons all his faith. He marries a Thai Chinese, Lan (Chrissie CHAU) and starts a new life in Thailand, but he never leaves the past behind. All these years he has been gathering information of the kidnap gang, and vows to take justice into his own hands at any cost…
